question.title: Print GeeksForGeeks
question.content:
You are given a C++ code that outputs two statements one is "Hello World" and another "GeeksForGeeks". Comment the code that outputs "Hello World", so that "GeeksForGeeks" gets printed.

Examples : 

Input: Not any
Output: GeeksForGeeks

rephrased.body: Given a C++ code that outputs two statements: "Hello World" and "GeeksForGeeks".  Modify the code by commenting out the line that prints "Hello World", so that only "GeeksForGeeks" is printed to the console.
